Class AbstractExecTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.context.task.AbstractTask

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecMoveTask, ExecOutputTask, ExecTask, TransferTask

    public abstract class AbstractExecTask
extends AbstractTask
    Execute an external command

    It provides some common functionnalities.
